title: Prosciutto Wrapped Chicken in a Mushroom and White Wine Cream Sauce
ingredients: ['30g butter or margarine, melted', '6 chicken thighs', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '6 slices prosciutto or thinly sliced bacon', '2 tablespoons finely chopped garlic, divided', '70g mushrooms, sliced', '50ml dry white wine', '250ml soured cream']
